```{r}
# sample_events_data <- sample_events_data %>%

small_events_data <- sample_events_data[1:10,]
legend.df <- small_events_data %>%
  select(species, color) %>%
  rename(description = species) %>%
  unique()

small_events_data <- small_events_data %>%
  rename(foobar = species) %>%
  mutate(new = rep(1, nrow(small_events_data)))

new.legend.df <- data.frame(
  description = c("spider","eagle owl"),
  color = c("red", "blue")
)

eventsObserveR(events = small_events_data, 
               place.key = "station",
               places = sample_locations_data,
               legend = new.legend.df,
               legend.columns = 2,
               # event.radius = 10,
               size = list(
                 view.width = 1040,
                 view.height = 720,
                 interface.width = 1200, 
                 interface.height = 900))
```
